resources.string: You are offline. Your data are not up to date.
Your new password was sent by email. Please check your emails.

Android application for the association COMIF of the Georges Charpak campus of the Ecole des Mines de Saint-Etienne. This application aims to allow users of the association to view the balance of their account and the products purchased.
